financial-hardship.title: Experiencing financial hardship
financial-hardship.summary: There may be benefits available to help you with a recent job loss or if you have low income, including financial help and retraining.
financial-hardship.secondaryHeadline: Government assistance when experiencing financial hardship
financial-hardship.eligibilityCriteriaDe: For the most accurate results, select the options that best describe your or the person applying for benefits situation. The list of benefits will reorder to prioritize the benefits you are most likely eligible for.
financial-hardship.topLevelFilter.label: Start here
